name: Aeon Mall BSD
address: BSD City, Jl. BSD Raya Utama, Pagedangan, Tangerang, Banten 15345.
about: Aeon Mall BSD is a modern shopping mall that offers a wide range of stores, including international and local brands, as well as a diverse selection of dining options. Visitors can also enjoy entertainment facilities such as a cinema and playground for visitors of all ages to enjoy. The mall has a spacious design, providing visitors with a comfortable and enjoyable shopping experience.

name: The Breeze
address: BSD Green Office Park, Jl. Grand Boulevard, BSD City, Tangerang, Banten 15345.
about: The Breeze is a lifestyle and entertainment center that offers visitors a variety of shopping, dining, and entertainment options, including a cinema, fitness center, and children's play area. It has a modern and relaxed atmosphere, providing visitors with a great place to relax and enjoy their time.

name: Q BIG BSD
address: Jalan BSD Raya Utama No. 1, Pagedangan, Tangerang, Banten 15345.
about: Qbig is a shopping and lifestyle destination that offers visitors a range of stores, restaurants, and cafes. It has a contemporary design and spacious atmosphere to provide visitors with a comfortable and enjoyable shopping experience.

name: ICE BSD
address: Jl. BSD Grand Boulevard No.1, Pagedangan, Kec. Pagedangan, Tangerang, Banten 15339.
about: ICE BSD is a large indoor venue that hosts a variety of events, including concerts, exhibitions, and conferences. The venue features state-of-the-art facilities and can accommodate large crowds. Visitors can expect a memorable and exciting experience at ICE BSD.

name: Pasar Intermoda
address: Jl. Lingkar Selatan, Serpong, BSD City, Tangerang, Banten 15310.
about: Pasar Modern Intermoda BSD Cisauk is a facility that combines shopping and recreational activities for families, with easy access through the free BSD Link bus service and the Cisauk commuter train station. Visitors can enjoy a range of shopping options, as well as various recreational activities, making it a great place for families to spend time together.
